trans-unit.source: Represents the geometry of a line.
trans-unit.target: 表示一条线的几何图形。

trans-unit.source: To create multiple connected lines, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment> or <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Polyline> segment with the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry> classes.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建多个连接的直线，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment>或<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Polyline>线段<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>类。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> </xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Polyline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment>

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the LineGeometry class provides several special features: LineGeometry objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **可冻结功能︰**从继承，因此<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>类，LineGeometry 类提供了一些特殊功能︰ 可以声明为在多个对象之间共享、 进行只读的以提高性能、 进行线程安全 LineGeometry 对象和克隆，。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关提供的不同功能的详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"></xref> class that has no length.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"></xref>长度为零的类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"></xref> class that has the specified start and end points.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"></xref>具有指定的开始和结束点的类。

trans-unit.source: The start point of the line.
trans-unit.target: 行的起点。

trans-unit.source: The end point of the line.
trans-unit.target: 行终结点。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The start point.
trans-unit.target: 起始点。

trans-unit.source: The end point.
trans-unit.target: 终结点中。

trans-unit.source: The transformation to apply to the line.
trans-unit.target: 要将应用于线条的转换。

trans-unit.source: Gets the axis-aligned bounding box of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取此轴对齐边界框<xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property does not take into account the area potentially added by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不会考虑可能由一种<xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>添加区域

trans-unit.source: The axis-aligned bounding box of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此轴对齐边界框<xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the end point of a line.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置线条的终点。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The end point of the line.
trans-unit.target: 行终结点。

trans-unit.source: The default is (0,0).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 (0，0)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry.EndPoint*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry.EndPoint*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry.EndPoint*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the area of the filled region of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取的填充区域的区域<xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The computational tolerance of error.
trans-unit.target: 计算的容错。

trans-unit.source: The specified type for interpreting the error tolerance.
trans-unit.target: 解释错误容限指定的类型。

trans-unit.source: The area of the filled region of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"></xref> object, which is always 0 because a line contains no area.
trans-unit.target: 填充区域的区域<xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"></xref>对象，它始终是 0 因为某个行包含没有区域。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"></xref> object is empty.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否这<xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"></xref>对象为空。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"></xref> is empty; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"></xref>空; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"></xref> object can have curved segments.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否这<xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"></xref>对象可以具有曲线段。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"></xref> object can have curved segments; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry"></xref>对象可以具有曲线段; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the start point of the line.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置行的起始点。

trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The start point of the line.
trans-unit.target: 行的起点。

trans-unit.source: The default is (0,0).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 (0，0)。
